nodes.text: Living Canals was a painting available in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War, sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It depicted an aerial portrait of lava channels being formed on the surface of the planet Mustafar.

Living Canals appeared in Trials of Obi-Wan, a 2005 expansion pack for the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which shut down on December 15, 2011.. It could be used as decoration in the player's house. It was obtained by inserting three Force-infused items—a sphere of water, an ammo box, and a spool of wire—into the Chu-Gon Dar cube, a Jedi relic capable of transmogrification through the Force. These items were looted from the corpses of the various enemies found on Mustafar.
